display_long_description:
Cosmic Punch VR is an immersive sci-fi action game built for VR hand tracking. Surrounded by asteroids and cosmic debris, you are the last defender of the galaxy. Using only your fists, unleash neon-charged punches to smash and shatter incoming space rocks before they reach you.

✨ Features

⚡Hand Tracking Combat – No controllers needed, fight with your fists!

⚡Cosmic Arena – Stand on a glowing holographic platform floating in deep space.

⚡Asteroid Smashing – Each punch cracks, glows, and explodes asteroids into pieces.

⚡Neon Visuals – A vibrant sci-fi aesthetic with glowing effects and cosmic particles.

⚡Immersive Audio – Punch impacts, asteroid shatters, and ambient galactic soundscapes.

👊 Gameplay

🌟Easy to pick up, hard to master – Perfect for quick casual sessions or extended play.

🌟Challenging waves – Increasing speed and intensity test your reflexes.

🌟Score system – Rack up combos and climb the leaderboards.

🚀 Why Play Cosmic Punch VR?

If you’ve ever wanted to feel like a superhero punching through space itself, Cosmic Punch VR delivers a thrilling arcade-style experience built for VR.
